title: Bubba Wallace, Avery Bradley, Seahawks, MLB
itunes:title: Bubba Wallace, Avery Bradley, Seahawks, MLB
description:
Colin gives his thoughts on the Bubba Wallace situation, why he agrees with Avery Bradley, why he thinks the Seahawks might interested in Antonio Brown, and why MLB will be interesting this season. Guests include Nick Wright, Emmanuel Acho, Eric Karros, and Carson Palmer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
